tool_description: Analyzes caller input and interaction history to classify the purpose and category of the call for appropriate routing.

caller_input.description: Initial input or response from caller describing their need

call_history.description: Array of previous call categories for this caller

ivr_selections.description: Array of IVR menu selections made by caller

error_messages: Empty caller input: Caller input cannot be empty or contain only whitespace.
Classification timeout: Unable to classify call purpose within time limit.
Ambiguous intent: Multiple possible classifications detected, manual routing required.
usage: Provide caller_input and optionally call_history and ivr_selections to classify the call purpose and determine routing category.

primary_category.description: Main category of the call purpose

subcategory.description: Specific subcategory within the main category

urgency_level.description: Assessed urgency level (low, medium, high, critical)

keywords.description: Key terms that influenced the classification
